Title: Establishes instruction in financial literacy for students in sixth through eighth grade
Summary: Establishes instruction in financial literacy for students in sixth through eighth grade; requires such instruction to include content on budgeting, savings, credit, debt, insurance, investment, and other issues associated with personal financial responsibility as determined by the education department.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing instruction in financial literacy for students in sixth through eighth grade
